2.「……だし しばらく……も してないなぁ。| うーん よしっ。次は 港のある町に: ...Seems like I'm a little out of practice.|Hmm, alright.|Next, I'll try a town with a harbor!

5.「あたたた……。すまない。 | 考え事をしながら 飛んではいけないね。| 君は: Owwww... Sorry.|Guess I shouldn't be flying when my head's in|the clouds, huh? Are you alright?

6.「それはよかった。私は サンビタリア。 | 見ての通りの 妖精さ。| しかーも！: Glad you're okay. I'm Sanvitalia.|I'm a fairy, as you can plainly see.|But I'm also...a seasoned adventurer!

7.「へ？ 妖精が なんでこんなところにって？ | というか 君こそ ここがどこだか: Huh?|"What's a fairy doing in a place like this?"|Don't you even know where you are?

8.「ここは 夢と現実の境界さ。| 元来 ここに 意識ある<pc_race>が| い: This is the boundary between dreams and|reality. Naturally, it's quite strange for a|conscious <pc_race> to be here.

9.「私は たまに 思考を巡らせるために| この空間を利用するんだ。今日は何をしよう: Sometimes I use this space to think.|What'll I do today, what should I have for|lunch, that sort of thing!

10.「……ふむ。どうやら 冒険者のようだが…… | なかなか 興味深いね。| 君 名: ...Hmm.|Seems you're an adventurer as well.|That's interesting. What's your name?

11.<if_woman>「なるほど……| <pc>ちゃんというのか。 <else>「: <if_woman>I see...Ms. <pc>, is it?<else>I see...Mr. <pc>, is it?<endif>

12.<if_woman>「よし！ <pc>ちゃん | ここで会ったのも 妖精の女王さ: <if_woman>Right then! Ms. <pc>, the Fairy|Queen guided us here together for a reason!|Please help me fulfill my mission!<else>Right then! Mr. <pc>, the Fairy|Queen guided us here together for a reason!|Please help me fulfill my mission!<endif>

13.「私は みんなをハッピーにするべく | 各地を冒険して そこに住まう人たちや|: I'm traveling the world to make everyone happy|by inspiring adventurers and the locals to get|to know each other.

14.「人と人とのふれあいこそが ハッピー！ | 会話をして 笑ったり 助け合ったり|:
The connections between people are what make|us happy! Having conversations, laughing|together, helping one another, and forming|
|bonds are the sources of everyone's happiness!

15.「……つまりだ。君には| 私が選んだ アストルティアにいる住人たちを| 見つけだ: ...In short, I want you to find and talk to|the inhabitants of Astoltia that I've chosen!

16.「そのためには 準備が必要だね……。: And for that, you need to be prepared,|right...?

18.<if_woman>「君には 黄色い魔法……出会いの魔法をかけた。 | これで: I cast a Spell of Yellow Meetings on you.|Now you'll see the names of people I've chosen|in yellow!

19.「これで あとは 黄色い名前の人を| 見つけて 話しかけるだけ！| どうだい 簡: Now all you have to do is find people with|yellow names and talk to them!|How easy is that?

20.「手伝ってもらうんだ。何かお礼をしないとな。| ……そうだね。ひとりに 話しかけ:
Since you're helping me, I should give you|something in return.|...Right then, how about this?|
|I'll give you a Mini Medal every time you|speak with someone I've chosen.

21.「さらに 話した人数に応じて| 追加でご褒美だって あげちゃうぞ！| どうだい: Plus, I'll even throw in extra prizes based on|the total number of people you've talked to!|Doesn't that sound great?<yesno><close>

22.「君は じつに 素直でいいね。| ますます 気に入ったよ。| そうだ これも渡し: You're a really agreeable person, aren't you?|I'm liking you more by the second. Oh yeah, I|should give you this, too.

23.「まぁまぁ そう言わずに。楽しくいこうぜ。| そうだ これも渡しておかないとな。: Come on now, don't say that. It'll be fun.|Oh yeah, I should give you this, too.

25.「かわいいだろう。私のと おそろいだぞ！| しかも この２冊は 書いたものが|:
Cute, yeah? And it even matches mine!|
|What's more, these two books have an amazing|feature that links what's written in them with|each other!

26.<if_woman>「私がこっちに アストルティアの住人を| 書くと <pc>ち: If I write the names of the people of Astoltia|in here, they'll also be listed in the one I|gave you.

27.「私が選んだ 住人の名前を記入しておくので| どうぐの だいじなものから| 確認: I'll fill in the names of the people I've|chosen, so you can check them out anytime|from your Key Items.
